name: alchemy-plugin-neo4jbackend
description: An Alchemyjs plugin for using Neo4j on the backend

scripts.test: coffee -co js . && cp -R tests/data js/tests/data && istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- -t 10000 --recursive js/tests -R spec -r should && cp README.md package.json js/

author: Matt Cox
